ValidationRule.description: Early Pay Tiers can be deleted, but values cannot be edited.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL(Election__c,' Monthly Payment (5th of the month) - 9 basis points (0.09%)') && OR( SBQQ__LowerBound__c <> 8, SBQQ__UpperBound__c <> 9, Basis_Points__c <> 9 )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Early Pay Tiers can be deleted, but values cannot be edited.
